name: Lost in Death
description:
In this little game you'll be playing as Grimmy the ghost trying to find his way to get to heaven...or maybe somewhere else?  Who knows what will happen when nothing is as it seems.. will the lies save him? or will the truth break him?  Will he succeed? Or will he go crazy? Good luck trying to escape...I mean find out his fate..

ps: My first ever game jam and the third game ever made!
